probs, mse = single_neuron_model(
    [[0.5, 1.0], [-1.5, -2.0], [2.0, 1.5]],
    [0, 1, 0],
    [0.7, -0.4],
    -0.1
)
print(([round(p,4) for p in probs], round(mse,4)))

probs, mse = single_neuron_model(
    [[1, 2], [2, 3], [3, 1]],
    [1, 0, 1],
    [0.5, -0.2],
    0
)
print(([round(p,4) for p in probs], round(mse,4)))
